data.text: @CNN @sumweardwnntx So not only is he HOT, but kind-hearted and generous, too.

@mscharleys @MTXR777 @CNN I’m the same. Grew up in a gun loving house but after Sandy Hook my mind slowly started changing and I 100% support gun control. I’m also registered republican but I’ll no longer vote for those who take NRA money. I’m not a liberal my mind has just changed

@MTXR777 @CNN First, I’m not “liberal”. I hold some conservative positions, so don’t paint with a broad brush. Second, I have like-minded friends, so I’m not so rare. Third, of my “liberal” friends, they don’t play the victim card. It pays to surround yourself with smart people w diff views.
@CNN Hero

@CNN JJ Watt epitomizes the compassion for humanity. If ever there was “sainthood”, JJ continues to quietly & humbly give to those who hurt in ways most of us may never know. He just is. He just does. No questions. Goes where his heart leads him. Peace JJ.
@CNN  https://t.co/XUqgYUS4rY
@myeungjin @CNN Who was high when they painted those street lanes?
@MikeFreddoso @CNN Story for the gods
@CNN A 'PRO' move
@ParisNuel @CNN The grieving families would have had to pay for the funerals, and now they don't. So really he did give that money to the living.
@CNN Love u JJ Watt. # Houstonproud👍

@CNN JJ Watt is MVP-caliber both on- and off-the-field. A true role-model for other athletes (and humanity, in general). A shame he has been put into the situation; but in times of great tragedy, our brightest lights shine.
@CNN Looking For #Banner #ads #Designer.Please Check it out! https://t.co/93g4TdtOnu
@CNN Great man you are JJ💜💜💜

@CNN No, I don’t bitch about how people spend their money. I do suggest using celebrity for good. Nice of him to pay for funerals. Nicer still never to have to or feel the need to for victims of school shootings.

@Hanuka_Moe @mscharleys @CNN Another fucken ignorant idiot that does not or cannot acknowledge the fact that guns kill, guns kill, guns kill faster and easier than any other hand held weapon. And this has nothing to do about politics and everything to do about life

@CNN Actually, no. A gun owning citizen, born in Washington DC, registered R until the Palin debacle. I keep my guns locked in a safe, unloaded. My kids grew up shooting targets/skeet. Never did they have the safe combination, and never did they have unsupervised access. Responsible.

@David747Heavy @CNN Firearms and Public Safety need to be a priority.  Perhaps JJ will use his public persona to influence those he can. Texas has a lot of schools, he'd be broke if this were his only available avenue of help.  .
@ParisNuel @CNN think he took care of that too....https://t.co/n6HLX2sRU0
@mscharleys @CNN Another Democratic puppet? Please no.
@CNN Re helping the living it is helping the living . The Family's won't be hit by the cost that has fallen upon them. So in that way they are giving their Family's money.
@CNN JJ WATT IS THE BOSS
@CNN He is an amazing young man
@CNN How about using your celebrity to speak out against gun violence and a gun culture who puts hobbyists and lobbyists ahead of the lives and futures of our children?
@CNN The cream always rises to the top. Heros are there to help those in need.
@CNN This gesture is so kind. @JJWatt your gesture is acknowledged the world over!
